root.name: Diabolik: The Original Sin
root.description: OverviewAn adventure game based on the Italian master thief, anti-hero comic book character; Diabolik. His partner in crime and lover Eva Kant is also featured.Stylistically the game the game combines polygonal 3D graphics with animated 2D comic panels, thematically drawing inspiration from 60s mystery and trillers such as Alfred Hitchkock’s The Man Who Knew too Much.Gameplay combines a point and click puzzles, mini-games and third person combat and stealth sequences.PlotEva has been kidnapped, the ransom requiring Diabolik to steal the Original Sin, a priceless painting, failing to do so will be the end of Eva.
